titleStmt.title: A trumpet sounded out of Zion as a warning to all the inhabitants of the earth, but more especially to this nation of England, which hath for a long time provoked the Lord by oppression and cruelty in persecuting his sons and daughters ...
titleStmt.author: Greene, Thomas, 1634?-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
